anya-e0301n1:1_0: 1. Abhidhammatthasaṅgahaṁ kattukāmo anuruddhatthero saṅgahārabbhe tāva sappayojane
anya-e0301n1:1_1: pañcapiṇḍatthe dassento ādigātha māha. Pañcapiṇḍatthānāma ratanattayavandanā, ganthābhidheyyo,
anya-e0301n1:1_2: ganthappakāro, ganthābhidhānaṁ, ganthappayojanaṁ. Tattha tīsu ratanesu nippaccakārakaraṇaṁ
anya-e0301n1:1_4: etehi padehi dassitā. Sakalena ganthena abhihitā padhānatthabhūtā cattāro abhidhammatthā
anya-e0301n1:1_5: ganthābhidheyyo. So abhidhammatthasaṅgahantipade abhidhammattha saddena dassito.
anya-e0301n1:3: Saṅgahitabhāvopi abhidheyyoyevāti katvā abhidheyyo abhidhammatthasaṅgahapadena dassitotivuttaṁ. Taṁ na sundaraṁ.
anya-e0301n1:4_0: Na hi so appadhānatthabhūto saṅgahitabhāvo imasmiṁ piṇḍatthadassane abhidheyyo nāma
anya-e0301n1:4_1: bhavituṁ yuttoti. Ito paṭṭhāyaca ṭīkāyanti vutte imassa saṅgahassa dvīsu sīhaḷaṭīkāsu
anya-e0301n1:4_2: pathamāṭīkā daṭṭhabbā. Vibhāvaniyanti vutte etarahi pākaṭā dutīyā. Ṭīkāsūti vutte
anya-e0301n1:4_3: dvepi. Mahāṭīkāyanti vutte visuddhimagge mahāṭīkā daṭṭhabbā. Yañca vacanaṁ vibhāvaniyaṁpi
anya-e0301n1:4_4: āgataṁ, aññatthāpi āgataṁ, taṁpi idha vibhāvaniyaṁtveva vuccati āsannattāti. Sabhāgadhammasaṅgahavasena
anya-e0301n1:4_5: ganthavidhānākāro ganthappakāro. So pana saṅgaha saddena dassito.
anya-e0301n1:7_0: Na hi abhidhammatthasaddo ganthavidhānākāraṁ dīpetīti. Atthā nugatā ganthasamaññā
anya-e0301n1:7_1: vanthābhidhānaṁ. Taṁ abhidhammattha saṅgahapadena dassitaṁ. Saṅgahaganthe kate sati
anya-e0301n1:7_2: taduggahaparipucchādivasena anāyāsato laddhabbaṁ dhammānaṁ sarūpāvabodhādikaṁ anupādāparinibbānantaṁ
anya-e0301n1:7_3: ganthassa phalānuphalaṁ ganthappayojanaṁ taṁpi abhidhammatthasaṅgahapadeneva sāmatthiyato dassitaṁ.
anya-e0301n1:10_0: Na hi abhidhammatthasaddena vinā anāyāsato saṁsiddhimattadīpakena saṅgahasaddamattena
anya-e0301n1:10_1: tādiso anupādāparinibbānanto payo janaviseso sakkā viññātuṁ, asaddhamma saṅgahānaṁpi
anya-e0301n1:11: 2. Tattha ratanattayavandanā tāva asaṅkheyyaappameyyappayojanā hoti. Yathāha –
anya-e0301n1:12: Te tādise pūjayato, nibbute akuto bhaye;
anya-e0301n1:13: Na sakkā puññaṁ saṅkhātuṁ, yamettha mapi kenacīti.
anya-e0301n1:14_0: Ya metthamapītiettha yenakenaci api manussenavā devenavā brahmunāvā saṅkhātuṁ na
anya-e0301n1:14_1: sakkāti yojanā. Ṭīkākārāpi taṁ payojanaṁ tattha tattha bahudhā papañcenti. Saṅgahakārā
anya-e0301n1:14_2: pana antarāyanīvāraṇameva visesato paccāsīsanti. Saṅgahakārā tica buddhaghosattherādayo
anya-e0301n1:19_1: hi nāma vandanākiriyābhinipphādako sattakkhattuṁ sattakkhattuṁ anekakoṭisatasahassavāre
anya-e0301n1:19_2: pavattamāno mahanto puññābhisando puññappavāho. So ca anuttaresu buddhādīsu puññakkhettesu
anya-e0301n1:19_3: saṁvaḍḍhitattā therassa ca uḷāracchandasaddhābuddhiguṇehi paribhāvitattā mahājutiko
anya-e0301n1:19_4: mahapphalo mahānisaṁso ca puññātisayo hoti. So sayaṁ payogasampattibhāve ṭhatvā bahiddhā
anya-e0301n1:19_5: vipattipaccaye apanetvā sampattipaccaye upanetvā atipaṇītautucittāhāra samuṭṭhitānaṁ
anya-e0301n1:19_6: sarīraṭṭhakadhātūnaṁ upabrūhanaṁ katvā paṭisandhito paṭṭhāya laddho kāsassa janakakammassa
anya-e0301n1:19_7: anubalaṁ deti. Aladdhokāsassa ca puññantarassa okāsalābhaṁ karoti. Atha laddhānubalena
anya-e0301n1:19_8: laddho kāsena ca tadubhayena puññena nibbattā rūpārūpasantatiyo therasantāne yamakamahānadiyo
anya-e0301n1:19_9: viya balavabalavanti yo hutvā pavattanti. Tadā tasmiṁ iṭṭhaphalaghanaparipūrite therasantāne
anya-e0301n1:19_10: aniṭṭhaphalabhūtānaṁ rogādi antarāyānaṁ uppattiyā okāso nāma natthīti iṭṭhaphalasantānavibādhakāni
anya-e0301n1:19_11: aniṭṭhaphalasantānajanakāni ca apuññakammāni dūrato apanītāneva honti. Na hi kammānināma
anya-e0301n1:19_12: puññāni apuññāni ca attano vipākuppattiyā okāse asati vipaccantīti. Tato tasmiṁ santāne
anya-e0301n1:19_13: āyuvaṇṇā dayo iṭṭhaphaladhammā yāva ganthaniṭṭhānā yāva āyukappapariyo sānāpi vā
anya-e0301n1:21: Cattāro dhammā vaḍḍhanti, āyuvaṇṇo sukhaṁ balanti.
anya-e0301n1:22_0: Evaṁ tāya vandanāya antarāyanīvāraṇaṁ hotīti. Tasmā saṅgahārabbhe ratanattayavandanākaraṇaṁ
anya-e0301n1:22_1: therassa attanā ārabbha mānasaṅgahassa anantarāyena parisamāpanutthaṁ. Na kevalañca
anya-e0301n1:22_2: therasseva, sotūnañca saṅgahaṁ gaṇhantānaṁ ādimhiyeva ratanattaya vandanā siddhito
anya-e0301n1:24: Sattasu javanesu pathamajavana vaseneva vandanā payojanaṁ vibhāvitaṁ viya dissati. ‘‘Diṭṭhadhammavedanīyabhūtā’’ti hi tattha vuttaṁ. Taṁ na sundaraṁ.
anya-e0301n1:25_0: Upatthambhanakiccasseva idha adhippetattā. Tassa ca sattasupi javanesu upaladdhattāti.
anya-e0301n1:25_1: Yathā hi āhārarūpassa dvīsu kiccesu ojaṭṭhamakarūpajananakiccaṁ parittakaṁ appamattakaṁ
anya-e0301n1:25_2: hoti. Catussanta tirūpupatthambhanakiccameva mahantaṁ adhimattaṁ. Tathāhi paṭṭhānepi
anya-e0301n1:25_3: tadupatthambhanakiccameva gahetvā kabaḷīkāro āhāro imassa kāyassa āhārapaccayena
anya-e0301n1:25_4: paccayoti vibhaṅgavāro vibhatto. Evamevaṁ idhapi pathamajavanassa avunāva vipākajananakiccaṁ
anya-e0301n1:25_5: parittakaṁ appamattakaṁ hoti. Ahetukavipākamattaṁ janetīti aṭṭhakathāsu vuttaṁ. Kammantarupatthambhanakiccameva
anya-e0301n1:25_6: mahantaṁ adhimattaṁ. Tañca sattasupi javanesu upalabbhati yevāti. Yasmā pana ganthābhidheyye
anya-e0301n1:25_7: ganthappakāre ganthappayojane ca ādito vivitesati sotu janānaṁ ganthassavane ussāho
anya-e0301n1:25_8: jāyati. Tasmā tesaṁ ganthā bhidheyyādīnaṁ dassanaṁ ganthe ussāhajananatthaṁ. Ganthābhidhānadassanaṁ
anya-e0301n1:26_0: 4. Ayaṁ pana padattho. Sammāca bujjhi sāmañca bujjhīti sammā sambuddho. Ettha ca
anya-e0301n1:26_1: sammāsaddo aviparītatthe nipāto. So bujjhitabbesu ñeyyadhammesu bujjhanakriyāya asesabyāvibhāvaṁ
anya-e0301n1:26_2: dīpeti. Tathāhi padesañāṇe ṭhitā paccekabuddhādayo attano visaye eva aviparītaṁ bujjhanti.
anya-e0301n1:26_3: Avisaye pana andhakāre paviṭṭhāviya hontīti aṭṭhakathāyaṁ vuttaṁ. Visayo ca tesaṁ
anya-e0301n1:26_4: appamattakova sabbaññuvisayaṁ upādāya yathā hattha puṭe ākāso appamattakova ajaṭākāsaṁ
anya-e0301n1:26_5: upādāyāti. Te hi phassādīsu dhammesu ekadhammampi sabbākārato bujjhituṁ nasakkontīti.
anya-e0301n1:26_6: Sabbaññubuddhānaṁ pana avisayo nāma natthi, yattha te viparītaṁ bujjheyyuṁ. Te hi
anya-e0301n1:26_7: anamatagge saṁsāre anantāsu ca lokadhātūsu tiyaddhagate addhamuttake ca dhamme hatthamaṇike
anya-e0301n1:26_8: viya samasame katvā bujjhanti. Sabbe dhammā sabbākārena buddhassa bhagavato ñāṇamukhe
anya-e0301n1:26_9: āpāta māgacchantīti hi vuttaṁ. Tattha ñāṇamukheti sabbaññuṁmahābhavaṅgaṁ sandhāyāha.
anya-e0301n1:26_10: Tattha hi te dhammā bodhimaṇḍe sabbaṁ abhidhammaṁ sammasanato paṭṭhāya niccakālaṁ
anya-e0301n1:26_11: upaṭṭhahantīti. Sabbaññubuddhā pana yattake dhamme vicāretuṁ icchanti. Tattake dhamme
anya-e0301n1:26_12: āvajjanāya visuṁ katvā āvajjitvā vicārentīti. Nanu dhammā mahantā bhavaṅgaṁ parittakanti
anya-e0301n1:26_13: na codetabbametaṁ. Arūpadhammānañhi paramukkaṁsapattānaṁ esa ānubhāvoti. Saṁsaddo
anya-e0301n1:26_14: pana sāmanti etassa atthe upasaggo. So bhagavato paṭivedhadhammesu anācariyakataṁ
anya-e0301n1:26_15: dīpeti. Na me ācariyo atthīti hi vuttaṁ. Nanu bhagavato tatīyacatutthāruppa samāpattiyo
anya-e0301n1:26_16: āḷārudakamūlikāti. Saccaṁ. Tā pana analaṅkaritvā laddhamattāva hutvā chaḍḍitattā
anya-e0301n1:26_17: pacchā bujjhanakriyāya pādakamattāpi nahonti. Kuto paṭivedhadhammāti. Tasmā tā bhagavato
anya-e0301n1:26_18: buddhabhāve sācariyakataṁ na sādhentīti. Ayamettha pāḷi anugato attho. Yathāha –
anya-e0301n1:27_0: Tattha katamo ca puggalo sammāsambuddho. Idhekacco puggalo pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu
anya-e0301n1:27_1: sāmaṁ saccāni abhisambujjhi. Tattha ca sabbaññutaṁ pāpuṇāti. Balesu ca vasibhāvaṁ.
anya-e0301n1:28_0: Tatthāti nimitte bhummaṁ. Balesūti dasabala ñāṇesu. Vasibhāvanti issarabhāvaṁ. Etthaca
anya-e0301n1:28_1: pubbe. La. Sāmantietena saṁsaddassa atthaṁ dasseti. Tatthātiādinā [sammāsaddassaatthanti.
anya-e0301n1:29_0: 5. Idāni thero attano vandanaṁ suṭṭhubalavaṁ karonto atulanti āha. Anekaguṇapadavisayā
anya-e0301n1:29_1: hi vandanā suṭṭhutaraṁ balavatī hotīti. Nanu ekaguṇapadavisayāpi vandanā antarā yanīvāraṇesamatthā
anya-e0301n1:29_2: siyāti kiṁ dutīyenāti. Na na samatthā. Viññujātikā pana satthuguṇatthomane mattakārino
anya-e0301n1:29_3: nāma na honti . Thero ca tesaṁ aññataro. Tvaṁ pana aviññujātiko. Tasmā mattaṁ karonto
anya-e0301n1:29_4: codesīti. Apica. Na kevalaṁ antarā yanīvāraṇameva vandanāya icchitabbaṁ hoti. Athakho
anya-e0301n1:29_5: paññāpāṭavādiatthopi icchitabboyeva. Sopi hi anāyāsena gantha niṭṭhānassa ganthapārisuddhiyā
anya-e0301n1:29_6: ca paccayo hotīti. Anussatiṭṭhānesu hi cittabhāvanā cittasamādhānāvahā hoti. Citta
anya-e0301n1:29_7: samādhāne ca sati paññātikkhāsūrā hutvā pahati. Samāhito bhikkhave yathābhūtaṁ pajānātīti
anya-e0301n1:29_8: hi vuttaṁ. Tasmā tadatthāyapi attano vandanā suṭṭhu balavatī kātabbāyevāti.
anya-e0301n1:31: ‘‘Yathāvuttavacanattha yogepi sammāsambuddhasaddassa bhagavati samaññāvasena pavattattā atulanti iminā vise setī’’ti vuttaṁ. Taṁ na sundaraṁ.
anya-e0301n1:32_0: Mahantañhi satthuguṇapadānaṁ majjhe etaṁ sammāsambuddhapadaṁ, cando viya tārakānaṁ
anya-e0301n1:32_1: majjhe. Tasmā taṁ sabhāvaniruttiṁ jānantānaṁsantike bhāvatthasuññaṁ satthusamaññāmattaṁ
anya-e0301n1:32_2: bhavituṁ nārahati. Aññesaṁ pana padasahassaṁ vuccamānaṁpi satthu samaññāmattameva
anya-e0301n1:32_3: sampajjatīti. Tulayitabbo aññena saha pamitabboti tulo. Na tulo atulo, natthitulo
anya-e0301n1:32_4: sadiso etassāti vā atulo. Bhagavā. Na hi atthi bhagavato attanā sadiso koci lokasminti. Yathāha –
anya-e0301n1:33: Na me ācariyo atthi, sadiso me na vijjati;
anya-e0301n1:35_0: Anacchariyañcetaṁ, yaṁ buddhabhūtassa atulattaṁ. Sampatijātassapi panassa atulatā
anya-e0301n1:35_1: paññāyati. Tadā hi mahāpuriso sampatijātova samāno puratthimadisābhimukho aṭṭhāsi.
anya-e0301n1:35_2: Tasmiṁ disā bhāge anantāni cakkavāḷāni ekaṅgaṇāni ahesuṁ. Tesu ṭhitā devabrahmāno
anya-e0301n1:35_3: mahāpurisa idha tumhehi sadiso natthi. Kuto uttaritaroti paramāya pujāya pūjesuṁ.
anya-e0301n1:35_4: Evaṁ sesadisāsupi. Tadā mahāpuriso attano sabbalokaggabhāvaṁ ñatvā aggohamasmi lokassa,
anya-e0301n1:35_5: seṭṭhohamasmilokassa, jeṭṭhohamasmilokassa ayamanti mājāti, natthi dāni punabbhavoti
anya-e0301n1:35_6: evaṁ achambhivācaṁ nicchāresīti. Idaṁpi anacchariyaṁ, yaṁ pacchimabhavaṁ pattassa
anya-e0301n1:35_7: atulattaṁ. Yadā pana so sumedhabhūto dīpaṅkarabuddhassa santike niyatabyākaraṇaṁ
anya-e0301n1:35_8: gaṇhi. Tadāpi thapetvā dīpaṅkarasammāsambuddhaṁ pāramitāguṇehi tena sadiso koci nattheva.
anya-e0301n1:35_9: Natthibhāvocassa tadā pavatte hi dasasahassilokadhātukampanādīhi asādhāraṇapāṭihāriyehi
anya-e0301n1:35_10: dīpetabbo. Tāni hi paccekabodhisattānaṁ satasahassaṁpi pavattetuṁ na sakkhissatiyeva.
anya-e0301n1:35_11: Kuto sāvakabodhi sattānanti. Teneva hi tadā pavattipāramipavicayaññāṇaṁ attano visaye
anya-e0301n1:35_12: sabbaññuthaññāṇagatikanti aṭṭhakathāyaṁ vuttaṁ. Sāvakabodhisattāpi hi yato paṭṭhāya
anya-e0301n1:35_13: attano bodhiyā anurūpe sambhāradhamme sayameva jānituṁ sakkonti. Tato paṭṭhāya anivattidhammā
anya-e0301n1:35_14: hutvā vattānusārimahāputhujjanabhāvaṁ atikkamitvā bodhisattabhūmiṁ okkantā honti.
anya-e0301n1:35_15: Ekena pariyāyena niyatā sambodhiparāyanā ca nāma honti. Tadā eva buddhānaṁ sammukhibhāve
anya-e0301n1:35_16: sati niyatabyākaraṇaṁ labhanti. Sabbaññu bodhisatta paccekabodhisattesu vattabbameva natthīti.
anya-e0301n1:37: Samitatthe yyakārassa akārassa vā vasena etaṁ siddhanti vuttaṁ. Taṁ na sundaraṁ.
anya-e0301n1:38_0: Na hi tulasaddo dhātusiddho kammasādhano ca bhavituṁ na yutto. Tulayituṁ asakkuṇeyyoti
anya-e0301n1:38_1: atulo. Appame yyoti hi ṭīkāyaṁ vuttaṁ. Etena tulasaddo kammasādhanoti dipeti. Evañca
anya-e0301n1:38_2: sati kammasādhaneneva tadatthasiddhito kiṁ tato samitatthe yyakārassaakārassa vā
anya-e0301n1:38_3: cintāyāti. Vatticchānugato saddappayogoti katvā etaṁ vuttanti ce. Na. Yathā sutaṁ
anya-e0301n1:38_4: yuttaṁ vajjetvā assutassa parikappanāya payo janābhāvatoti. [Atula padaṁ]
anya-e0301n1:39_0: 6. Imehi pana dvīhi padehi satthu tisso sampadā vibhā vitā honti. Hetusampadā phalasampadā
anya-e0301n1:39_1: sattupakārasampadācāti. Tattha satthu mahākaruṇā samaṅgitā bodhisambhārasambharaṇañca
anya-e0301n1:39_2: hetusampadānāma. Bodhimaṇḍe pavattitā catuvīsati koṭisabhasahassasaṅkhā mahāvajiraññāṇasaṅkhātā
anya-e0301n1:39_3: sabbaññumahā vipassanāpi ettheva saṅgahitā. Sā hi mahābodhiyā padaṭṭhāna bhūtāti.
anya-e0301n1:39_4: Pahāna sampadāyameva vā sā saṅgahitāti daṭṭhabbā. Phalasampadā catubbidhā pahānasampadā
anya-e0301n1:39_5: ñāṇasampadā ānubhāvasampadā rūpakāyasampadā cāti. Tattha saha vāsanāya kilesappahānaṁ
anya-e0301n1:39_6: pahānasampadā nāma. Pahānassa sabbapāripūritāti attho. Atthato pana ariyamaggo, aggamaggaññāṇameva
anya-e0301n1:41_0: Etāsu dvīsu sampadāsu ñāṇasampadā pathamaṁ vuttā, tato pahānasampadā. Pahānasampadāyeva
anya-e0301n1:41_1: pana pathamaṁ vattabbā. Sā hi ñāṇasampadāyapubbaṅgamabhūtā paccayabhūtā ca. Mahāṭīkāyañca
anya-e0301n1:43: ‘‘Sabbaññutaññāṇapadaṭṭhānaṁ aggamaggaññāṇa’’nti ñāṇasampadāyaṁ vuttaṁ. Taṁpi na yujjati.
anya-e0301n1:44_0: Aggamaggaññāṇañhi pahānasampadā eva bhavituṁ arahati. Na hi maggaññāṇato aññā pahānasampadānāma
anya-e0301n1:44_1: atthīti. Yañca koci vadeyya maggaññāṇaṁ ñāṇañca hoti pahānañca. Tasmā ubhayattha
anya-e0301n1:44_2: vattuṁ yuttanti. Taṁpi na yujjati. Evañhi sati sampadāsaṅkaro hotīti.
anya-e0301n1:46: Ñāṇasampadāyaṁ sabbaññutaññāṇaṁ sabbapathamaṁ vattabbaṁpi na vuttaṁ. Taṁpi na sundaraṁ.
anya-e0301n1:47: Nanu ‘‘tammūlakāni ca dasabalādi ññāṇānī’’ti ettha ādisaddena sabbaññutaññāṇaṁpi gahitanti ce. Taṁpi na yujjati.
anya-e0301n1:48_0: Na hi appadhānaṁ sarūpato niddisitvā padhānaṁ pākaṭaṁ ādisaddena gahitanti ñāyāgataṁ
anya-e0301n1:48_1: hotīti. Acinteyyānubhāvehi sīlā diguṇehi iddhi dhammehi ca sampadā ānubhāvasampadā.
anya-e0301n1:48_2: Lakkhaṇā nubyañjanappaṭimaṇḍitassa rūpakāyassa sampatti rūpakāyasampadā. Sattupakāroduvidho
anya-e0301n1:48_3: āsayasampadā, payogasampadā ca. Ajjhāsayassa uḷāratā kāyavacīpayogassa ca parisuddhatāti
anya-e0301n1:48_4: attho. Tattha devadattādīsu virodhisattesupi niccaṁ hitajjhāsayatā āsaya sampadā.
anya-e0301n1:48_5: Loke abhiññātānaṁ rājūnaṁ rājamahāmattānaṁ seṭṭhi gahapatīnaṁ devarājūnampi dhammaṁ
anya-e0301n1:48_6: desentassa lābhasakkārādi nirapekkhatāvasena desanāpayogasuddhi payogasampadā. Tattha
anya-e0301n1:48_7: dve pahānañāṇasampadā sammāsambuddhapadena vibhāvitā. Dvīhi ānu bhāvarūpakāyasampadāhi
anya-e0301n1:48_8: saha dve sattupakārasampadā atulapadena. Hetusampadā pana dvīhipi padehi sāmatthiyato
anya-e0301n1:48_9: vibhāvitā. Na hi tādisiyā hetusampadāya vinā itarāsaṁ pavatti atthīti. [Sampadā]
anya-e0301n1:49_0: 7. Punapi thero attano vandanaṁ balavataraṁ karonto sasaddhammagaṇuttamanti āha.
anya-e0301n1:49_1: Etena dhammasaṅghānaṁpi vandanā katā hoti. Dūratohaṁ namassissaṁ, sasaṅghaṁ lokanāyakanti
anya-e0301n1:49_2: hi vutte saṅghassapi namanakriyāpatti sahasaddena viññāyati. Eva midaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0301n1:51_0: ‘‘Guṇībhūtānaṁpi hi dhammasaṅghānaṁ abhivādetabba bhāvo sahayogena viññāyatī’’ti
anya-e0301n1:51_1: vuttaṁ. Tattha abhivādetabba bhāvoti navattabbaṁ. Abhivāditabhāvoti pana abhivādananti
anya-e0301n1:51_2: vā vattabbaṁ. Evañhi sati idha adhippetassa kriyā samavāyassa siddhattā dhammasaṅghānaṁpi
anya-e0301n1:51_3: therassa vandanā kriyāpatti siddhā hotīti. Itarathā tabbapaccayassa arahatthadīpanato
anya-e0301n1:51_4: abhivādanā rahatā saṅkhāta guṇasamavāyo vutto siyā. Soca idha nādhippeto. Attano
anya-e0301n1:51_5: nidassanena ca saha na sameti saputtadāro āgatoti.
anya-e0301n1:52_0: Apica thero imaṁ ganthaṁ racayissāmīti pubbabhāgeyeva tīṇi ratanāni vandi, atha taṁ
anya-e0301n1:52_1: attano vandanaṁ ganthappaṭiññāya saha ghaṭetvā dassento imaṁ gāthaṁ racayītipi na
anya-e0301n1:52_2: na sakkā vattunti. Tathāhi abhivādiyāti vuttaṁ. Na abhivādiyāmīti. Esanayo aññatthapi.
anya-e0301n1:52_3: Tattha saddhammena ca gaṇuttamena ca attanā nimmitena sakalalokassa saraṇabhūtena
anya-e0301n1:52_4: saha vattatīti sasaddhamma gaṇuttamo. Sammāsambuddho. Na hi paranimmitena saddhammena
anya-e0301n1:52_5: gaṇuttamena ca sahitā sāvakā sasaddhammāti ca sagaṇuttamāti ca vuccanti. Na ca attanoeva
anya-e0301n1:52_6: saraṇabhūtena saddhammena sabrahmacārigaṇuttamena ca sahitā paccekabuddhā tathā thomanaṁ
anya-e0301n1:52_7: arahantīti, tasmā idaṁpi satthu asādhāraṇaguṇapadameva hotīti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0301n1:53_0: Tattha dhāretīti dhammo. Ke dhāreti, attānaṁ dhārente. Dhammo have rakkhati dhammacārinti
anya-e0301n1:53_1: hi vuttaṁ. Kathañca dhāreti, catūsu apāyesu vaṭṭadukkhesuca apatamāne karonto. Kiñca
anya-e0301n1:53_2: dhāraṇaṁnāma, yesaṁ vasena sattā apāyesuvā vaṭṭadukkhesuvā patanti, tesaṁ kilesānaṁ
anya-e0301n1:53_3: ekadesenavā sabbasovā samucchindanaṁ. Imasmiṁ atthe cattāro ariyamaggā nibbānañca
anya-e0301n1:53_4: nippariyāyato dhammonāma. Ariyamaggā hi kilese samucchindantā nibbānena saheva hutvā
anya-e0301n1:53_5: samucchindanti. Na vināti, tasmā teyeva pañca ekantato dhammonāmāti. Pariyattidhammo
anya-e0301n1:53_6: pana dhāraṇupāyoyeva hoti. Cattāri sāmaññaphalānica dhāraṇaphalāniyeva honti, kilesānaṁ
anya-e0301n1:53_7: paṭippassambhanavasena pavattattā dhāraṇānukūlappavattāni ca. Tasmā ete pañca pariyāyadhammāyevāti.
anya-e0301n1:53_8: Athavā , dhārīyatīti dhammo. Dhāraṇārahoti vuttaṁ hoti. Yo hi dhārentaṁ ekantena
anya-e0301n1:53_9: dukkhato moceti. Aggasukheca patiṭṭhāpeti. Soyeva dhāraṇārahattā idha dhammonāmāti.
anya-e0301n1:53_10: Kopana soti, yathā puttadhammāyeva. Tehi keci bhāvanā vasena keci sacchikiriyavasena
anya-e0301n1:53_11: keci diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāravasena keci uggaha dhāraṇavasena dhārīyanti. Te ca evaṁ
anya-e0301n1:53_12: dhārīyamānā dhārentaṁ yathārahaṁ apāyadukkhato vaṭṭadukkhatoca mocenti, aggeca phalasukhevā
anya-e0301n1:53_13: nibbānasukhevā patiṭṭhāpentīti. Dhārentivā sappurisājanā apāyesu vaṭṭadukkhesuca
anya-e0301n1:53_14: attānaṁ apata mānaṁ vahanti etenāti dhammo. Dharantivā ettha dhammadīpā dhammappaṭisaraṇā
anya-e0301n1:53_15: janā laddhappatiṭṭhā hontīti dhammotipi yujjatiyeva. Kasmā panettha dhammo dasavidhova
anya-e0301n1:53_16: vutto. Nanu paṭipattidhammena saha ekādasavidhova vattabboti. Saccaṁ. Sopana paṭipattidhammo
anya-e0301n1:53_17: maggassa pubbabhāgappaṭipadāeva hotīti pubbacetanā viya dāne magge eva so saṅgahito.
anya-e0301n1:53_18: Tasmā dhammo dasavidhova sabbattha vuttoti daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0301n1:54_0: Apica, yadaggena pariyattidhammo idha dhammasmiṁ saṅgahito. Tadaggena pariyattidhārakopi
anya-e0301n1:54_1: saṅghe vandaneyye saṅgahitoti yutto. Yadaggenaca puthujjanakalyāṇako saṅghe sekkhesu
anya-e0301n1:54_2: saṅgahito. Tadaggena tassa kalyāṇahetubhūto paṭipatti dhammopi dhamme vandaneyye
anya-e0301n1:54_3: saṅgahitoti daṭṭhabbo. So hi puthujjanabhūtopi yehi dhammehi samannāgatattā sekhe
anya-e0301n1:54_4: sotāpatti phalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanne saṅgahito. Te pana dhammā sekkhe sotāpattimagge
anya-e0301n1:54_5: asaṅgahitāti nasakkā vattunti. Ettāvatā ye vadanti saṅghaṁ saraṇaṁ gacchāmīti, ettha
anya-e0301n1:54_6: puthujjana kalyāṇako saṅghe asaṅgahito. Na hi taṁsaraṇaṁ gacchantassa saraṇagamanaṁ
anya-e0301n1:54_7: sampajjatīti. Tesaṁ taṁ paṭikkhittaṁ hoti. Evaṁ pana vattabbo, yo vo ānanda mayā
anya-e0301n1:54_8: dhammoca vinayoca desito paññatto, so vo mamaccayena satthāti evaṁ satthuṭhāne thapetvā
anya-e0301n1:54_9: bhagavatā saṁvaṇṇito pariyattidhammo dhammasaraṇe saṅgahitoti yutto, taṁ dhārentopana
anya-e0301n1:54_10: kalyāṇappaṭipattiyaṁ ṭhitopi atthi. Aṭṭhitopi atthi. Yo aṭṭhito, so attanopi saraṇaṁ
anya-e0301n1:54_11: nahoti. Kuto parassa. Satthārā ca anekesu suttasahassesu so garahito. Tasmā so saṅghasaraṇe
anya-e0301n1:55_0: Santānaṁ dhammoti saddhammo. Samitakilesānaṁ tatoyeva pasatthānaṁ pūjitānaṁ sappurisānaṁ
anya-e0301n1:55_1: paṇḍitānañca dhammoti attho. Yoca santānaṁ dhammo, sopi ekantena santoyeva hotīti
anya-e0301n1:55_2: santo dhammotipi saddhammo. Pasattho pūjito dhammoti attho. Sacco vā. Ayañhi aññatitthiyadhammo
anya-e0301n1:55_3: viya dhārentaṁ navisaṁvādeti. So hi ayaṁ me hitoti dhārentassa ahitoyeva sampajjati.
anya-e0301n1:55_4: Ayaṁ pana tathādhārentassa hitoyeva sampajjatīti. [Saddhammapadaṁ]. Gaṇuttamapade
anya-e0301n1:55_5: loke samāna diṭṭhisīlānaṁ sahadhammikānaṁ samūho gaṇoti vuccati. Idha pana uttamehi
anya-e0301n1:55_6: sīlādiguṇehi yutto bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho uttamoca so gaṇocāti atthena uttamagaṇonāma.
anya-e0301n1:55_7: Soyeva idha gaṇuttamoti vuccati yathā muniseṭṭho munivaroti.
anya-e0301n1:57: ‘‘Gaṇānaṁ gaṇesuvā devamanussādisamūhesu uttamo gaṇuttamo’’ti ca vuttaṁ. Taṁ na sundaraṁ.
anya-e0301n1:58_0: Etasmiñhi atthe sati uttamasaddo padhānabhūto hoti. Soca guṇamhiyeva pavattatīti
anya-e0301n1:58_1: tena idha ariyasaṅgho vuttoti nasijjhatīti. Etthaca gaṇoti saṅghoyeva vuccati. Soca
anya-e0301n1:58_2: saṅgho duvidho sammutisaṅgho, dakkhiṇeyyasaṅghoti. Tattha samaggena saṅghena kataṁ
anya-e0301n1:58_3: upasampadākammaṁ sammutināma. Tāya sammutiyā upasampannabhūmiṁ patvā ṭhito bhikkhusaṅgho
anya-e0301n1:58_4: sammutisaṅghonāma. So vinayakammesu pasiddho. Dakkhiṇeyyasaṅgho nāma aṭṭha ariyapuggalasamūho.
anya-e0301n1:58_5: Sopana kiñcāpi sammutisaṅghepi antogadhoyeva hoti. Tathāpi saraṇagamana vandanā māna
anya-e0301n1:58_6: pūjāsakkārānussatiṭṭhānesu anuttara puññakkhetta vise sapariggahatthaṁ bhagavatā
anya-e0301n1:58_7: tathā tathā saṁvaṇṇetvā so visuṁ vuttoti daṭṭhabbo. Puthujjanasaṅghohi puññakkhettaṁ
anya-e0301n1:58_8: samānopi anuttaraṁ puññakkhettaṁ nahoti. Kasmā. Sālikkhette tiṇānaṁ viya khettaduṭṭhānaṁ
anya-e0301n1:58_9: sakkāyadiṭṭhi vicikicchānusayānaṁ sabbhāvāti. Puññakkhettabhāvo panassa purime saddhammapade
anya-e0301n1:59_0: 8.Abhivādiyāti visesato vanditvā. Ettha ca ayaṁ loke sīlādiguṇayutto seṭṭho vandaneyyoti
anya-e0301n1:59_1: evaṁ seṭṭha cittaṁ paccupaṭṭhāpetvā vandanto visesato vandatīti vuccati. Vandanā
anya-e0301n1:60: Tisso imā bhikkhave vandanā, katamā tisso. Kāyena vandati, vācāya vandati, manasā vandatīti.
anya-e0301n1:61_0: Tattha seṭṭhacittaṁ paccupaṭṭhāpetvā jāṇudvaya kapparadvaya nalāṭa saṅkhātāni pañca
anya-e0301n1:61_1: aṅgāni bhūmiyaṁ patiṭṭhāpetvā vandaneyyānaṁ abhimukhaṁ nippajjanto kāyena vandatināma.
anya-e0301n1:61_2: Yaṁ sandhāya pañcappatiṭṭhitena vanditvāti tattha tattha vuttaṁ. Yāyaca avandiyaṭṭhānesu
anya-e0301n1:61_3: vandantassa āpatti hotīti. Guṇapadāni vācāya pavattento vācāya vandatināma. Namo
anya-e0301n1:61_4: buddhassa, namatthu buddhassa, namo vimuttiyā, namo vimuttānaṁ, vipassissa namatthūti
anya-e0301n1:61_5: evamādīsupi vācā vandanāyeva. Guṇapadāni anugantvā guṇe anussaranto manasā vandatināmāti.
anya-e0301n1:62: 9.Bhāsissanti kathessāmi. Kāmañca thero imaṁ saṅgahaṁ racayanto potthakāruḷhaṁ katvāva racayissati. Ganthakammaṁ nāma vācākammesu pasiddhanti katvā bhāsissanti vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0301n1:63_0: 10.Abhidhammatthasaṅgahanti pade abhidhamme vuttā atthā abhidhammatthā. Te saṅgayhanti
anya-e0301n1:63_1: ettha etenātivā abhidhammatthasaṅgaho. Saṅgayhantitica therena saṁkhipitvā gayhanti
anya-e0301n1:63_2: kathīyantīti attho. Abhidhammeti cettha abhiatireko abhivise soca dhammo abhidhammo.
anya-e0301n1:63_3: Dhammoti ca vinayapāḷito aññaṁpāḷi dvayaṁ vuccati. Yo vo ānanda mayā dhammoca vinayoca
anya-e0301n1:63_4: desito paññattoti hi vuttaṁ. Tañca pāḷidvayaṁ āṇāvidhānasaṅkhātaṁ vinayana kiccaṁ
anya-e0301n1:63_5: vajjetvā kusalādike yathāpavatte paramatthadhamme eva dīpetīti. Evaṁ dīpentesuca
anya-e0301n1:63_6: tesu dvīsu dhammesu yo itarato atirekoca hoti visesoca. Ayameva abhidhammo nāma.
anya-e0301n1:63_7: Itaropana dhammoyeva. Evañca katvā dhammo abhidhammo vinayo abhivinayoti idaṁ catukkaṁ
anya-e0301n1:63_8: veditabbaṁ. Tattha dhammonāma suttantapiṭakaṁ. Abhidhammonāma yattapakaraṇāni. Vinayonāma
anya-e0301n1:63_9: ubhato vibhaṅgo, abhivinayonāma khandhakaparivārāti aṭṭhakathāsu vuttaṁ. Atirekavisesatā
anya-e0301n1:63_10: cettha kusalādi vasena khandhādivasena saṅgahādivasena tathā tathā desetabbappakārānaṁ
anya-e0301n1:63_12: Yato sabbaññubuddhā imaṁ abhidhammadesanaṁ devesueva desenti. Na hi manussā evarūpaṁ
anya-e0301n1:63_13: tayo māse nirantaraṁ pavattanayogyaṁ kathāmaggaṁ ekena iriyāpathena ādito paṭṭhāya
anya-e0301n1:63_14: pariyosānaṁ pāpetvā paṭiggahetuṁ sakkonti, naca eva rūpo ekamātikānubandho kathāmaggo
anya-e0301n1:63_15: nānākhaṇesu nānājanānaṁ desetuṁ sakkuṇeyyo hotīti. Kecipana vinayapāḷitopi abhirekavisesataṁ
anya-e0301n1:63_16: tassa vaṇṇenti. Taṁ aṭṭhasāliniyā na sameti. Tattha hi dhammanāmikānaṁ dvinnaṁ pāḷīnaṁ
anya-e0301n1:63_17: majjheeva ayaṁ atirekavisesatā vicāritā. Naca yujjati vinayena saha tathā vicāretuṁ
anya-e0301n1:63_18: asamānakiccavisayattā. Vinayo hi kāyavācānaṁ vinayanakicco, ajjhācāravisayoca. Dhammo
anya-e0301n1:63_19: pana dhammavibhāgakicco dhammappavatti visayocāti. Kecipana vadanti evaṁ santepi
anya-e0301n1:63_20: vinayo eva sabbajeṭṭhako siyā. Vinayaṁ vivaṇṇentassa hi pācittiyāpatti hoti. Dhammaṁ
anya-e0301n1:63_21: vivaṇṇentassa dukkaṭāpattimattāti, taṁ nayujjati. Vinayo hi āṇācakkaṁ. Dhammoca dhammacakkaṁ.
anya-e0301n1:63_22: Tattha vinayaṁ vivaṇṇento satthu āṇācakke pahāraṁ deti. Satthari agāravo mahanto
anya-e0301n1:63_23: hoti. Yassaca satthari agāravo, tassa dhammasaṅghesu tīsu sikkhāsuca agāravo siddho
anya-e0301n1:63_24: hoti. Tasmā vinaya vivaṇṇane āpatti mahantī hoti. Na sabbajeṭṭhakattāti. Apica, vinayonāma
anya-e0301n1:63_25: sāsanassa mūlaṁ. Vinaye aṭṭhite sāsanaṁ natiṭṭhati. Tasmā sāsanassa ciraṭṭhitatthaṁpi
